description:
More assertive than bells, this compact horn puts out 112dB that can be heard a kilometre away. It doubles as a signalling device for an outdoor emergency kit.

  • Operates with a simple push button
  • Canister provides 12, 2-second blasts
  • Contents are 100% ozone safe and non-flammable
  • Can be heard up to 0.8km on land and 1.6km on water
  • Height is 11.4cm
  • Replacement canisters available
name: Kodiak Wildlife Deterrent Horn
